starting_area.name: The Starting Village
starting_area.description: A peaceful village where new adventurers begin their journey. The cobblestone streets are lined with shops and homes, and the air is filled with the sounds of daily life.

forest_area.name: The Whispering Woods
forest_area.description: A dense forest filled with ancient trees and mysterious sounds. The canopy above blocks most sunlight, creating a dim, mystical atmosphere.

mountain_area.name: The Iron Peaks
mountain_area.description: Rugged mountain terrain with rocky outcrops and steep paths. The air is thin and cold, and the sound of wind echoes through the peaks.

deep_forest.name: The Shadowed Grove
deep_forest.description: The deepest part of the forest, where the trees grow so thick that no light penetrates. Strange creatures lurk in the shadows.

mountain_caves.name: The Crystal Caverns
mountain_caves.description: A network of caves deep within the mountains, filled with glowing crystals and ancient secrets.
